title: Bug 4971: Unexpected package 'ui' copied during 'copy package' operation
description: Bug 4971: Strange 'copy package' behavior observed while using 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in 'jdt.ui3'. When selecting 'xxx' as the destination during the 'copy package' operation, the result is that 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
OB: During the 'copy package' operation, when 'xxx' is selected as the destination, 'xx' contains a package named 'ui'.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:

1. Open 'org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui' in 'jdt.ui3'.
2. Perform the 'copy package' operation.
3. Select 'xxx' as the destination.

Expected behavior:

After completing the 'copy package' operation with 'xxx' selected as the destination, 'xx' should not contain a package named 'ui'.
